title: Foundation and Vision
desc: This phase focuses on establishing the necessary infrastructure and forging key collaborations essential for the foundational structure of the business.

title: Launchpad & Onboarding
desc: In this stage, the emphasis is on rolling out the Launchpad, developing essential project management tools, and hosting events to engage stakeholders.

title: Social Mining
desc: The key activities involve launching a platform dedicated to social mining, incentivizing user engagement, and organizing community-centric events.

title: ISO & Engagement
desc: This phase is about introducing an ISO platform, developing a robust review system, and organizing various events to boost engagement.

title: Trading Ecosystem
desc: The focus here is on introducing innovative AI-driven trading tools and conducting comprehensive training sessions to educate users or team members.

title: Team & Skill Enhancement
desc: This stage involves recruiting industry experts, providing extensive training to the team, and launching a platform for enhanced team interaction.

title: AI Plugin Play
desc: The key tasks include launching a specialized platform, creating a library of AI plugins, and conducting workshops to facilitate knowledge sharing and skill development.

title: AI & Data Integration
desc: This phase is centered on the development of AI algorithms, integrating these insights for enhanced decision-making, and hosting events focused on AI advancements.

title: Security & Trust
desc: The activities focus on implementing robust protection mechanisms, publishing detailed reports to establish transparency, and hosting events to emphasize security.

title: Integration & Outreach
desc: This final phase ensures seamless integration of all platforms, explores opportunities for global expansion, and sets the vision for the future of the business.
